name: Ultimate Hero Showdown
description:
Choose from six heroes and fight against a friend in Ultimate Hero Showdown!

Each hero has four moves that can change their stats in a variety of ways, use tactical thinking to outsmart your opponent, boosting your attack and weakening theirs.

Each hero has a nature that affect how much damage they can do, use water against a hero with a fire nature and you'll hit for massive damage.

(Please note game is not complete, art and audio are not original, and there is a bug with the current upload with hero choosing, so team choice is hard coded, sorry in advance)
